languages.text: Дерзость была наказана. Благодаря железной дисциплине, царящей в колонии, строгие расправы не сказались на ее работоспособности.
The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
languages.original_text: Дерзость была наказана. Благодаря железной дисциплине, царящей в колонии, строгие расправы не сказались на ее работоспособности.

traits.locale_text: Insolence has been punished. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
Insolence has been punished. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

languages.text: La insolencia de los colonos ha sido resuelta. Dada la férrea disciplina de la colonia, los brutales castigos no han afectado a su productividad.
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

traits.locale_text: La insolencia de los colonos ha sido resuelta. Dada la férrea disciplina de la colonia, los brutales castigos no han afectado a su productividad.

languages.text: Les colons insolents ont été rappelés à l'ordre. En raison de la discipline de fer qui règne dans la colonie, les punitions, pourtant sévères, n'ont pas eu d'impact sur la productivité.
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

traits.locale_text: Les colons insolents ont été rappelés à l'ordre. En raison de la discipline de fer qui règne dans la colonie, les punitions, pourtant sévères, n'ont pas eu d'impact sur la productivité.

languages.text: 此举成功遏制了殖民地的歪风邪气。由于内部纪律严明，严厉的惩罚并没有影响殖民地的生产。
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

traits.locale_text: 此举成功遏制了殖民地的歪风邪气。由于内部纪律严明，严厉的惩罚并没有影响殖民地的生产。

languages.text: 入植者たちの横暴への対処は済んだ。コロニー内には鉄の規律が敷かれていたため、厳しい処罰もコロニーの生産性には影響しなかった。
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

traits.locale_text: 入植者たちの横暴への対処は済んだ。コロニー内には鉄の規律が敷かれていたため、厳しい処罰もコロニーの生産性には影響しなかった。

languages.text: Die Unverfrorenheit der Kolonisten wurde bestraft. Aufgrund der eisernen Disziplin in der Kolonie haben die Strafen sich nicht negativ auf die Produktivität ausgewirkt.
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.

traits.locale_text: Die Unverfrorenheit der Kolonisten wurde bestraft. Aufgrund der eisernen Disziplin in der Kolonie haben die Strafen sich nicht negativ auf die Produktivität ausgewirkt.

languages.text: Kolonicilerin terbiyesizliği karşılık buldu. Kolonideki sıkı disiplin sayesinde ağır cezaların üretim durumuna olumsuz bir etkisi olmadı.
languages.original_text: The insolence of the colonists has been dealt with. Due to the ironclad discipline within the colony, the harsh punishments did not affect its productivity.
